personal.name: Raj Mathur
personal.title: Software Developer Intern | Backend Specialist
personal.subtitle: Computer Science student passionate about building scalable backend systems and RESTful APIs with expertise in Java, Spring Boot, and modern web technologies.

about.description: I'm a dedicated Computer Science student at IIIT Bhubaneswar with a CGPA of 7.83/10, passionate about backend development and system design. Currently working as a Software Developer Intern at Smart Orbit Pvt Ltd, where I develop RESTful APIs and implement location-based search features. I have strong expertise in Java, Spring Boot, Node.js, and database management, with a proven track record of optimizing system performance and reducing response times.
highlights: LeetCode Knight with rating 1948 and 900+ problems solved, ranked in top 3%
Reduced API response time by 40% using Node.js and Express.js
Implemented geospatial filtering resulting in 25% faster search results
Winner of GeoHack 2024 and The Innovation hackathons
Improved development efficiency by 35% through comprehensive API documentation
Achieved 99.9% uptime for scalable applications using Spring Boot and MySQL

projects.title: Online Food Delivery App Backend
projects.description: Comprehensive backend system for food delivery application with secure user authentication and role-based access control. Implemented JWT-based authentication and Spring Security to reduce unauthorized access by 95% and admin overhead by 40%. Achieved 99.9% uptime with high availability and scalability using Spring Boot and MySQL.

projects.title: Social Media App Backend
projects.description: Real-time social media backend with WebSocket integration for instant messaging and notifications. Reduced message latency by 60% and enhanced user engagement through persistent bidirectional communication. Boosted backend performance by 45% through caching and query optimization techniques.

projects.title: RESTful API Development
projects.description: Developed and maintained comprehensive RESTful APIs using Node.js and Express.js, achieving 40% reduction in API response time. Implemented geospatial filtering for location-based search features, resulting in 25% faster search results and 30% increase in user engagement.

experience.description: Working on developing and maintaining RESTful APIs and implementing location-based search features for enhanced user experience and system performance.
achievements: Developed and maintained RESTful APIs using Node.js and Express.js, reducing API response time by 40%

Streamlined development workflow by creating comprehensive API documentation, reducing onboarding time for new team members by 50%

Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality software solutions
